content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern for the slouch & ear warmer including all photo tutorials and a graph in one printable file without advertisements **slouch** the chevron peaks slouch crochet hat pattern is a super quick crochet design that s perfect for the upcoming winter months and it uses less than 1 ball of yarn it s a fun project that s quick to make and it looks great in so many different colors **yarn notes ** lion brand jeans in the colorway brand new was used for the samples in the photos sizes included child teen/adult small & adult medium/large **ear warmer** the chevron peaks ear warmer sample was crocheted using lion brand yarns pound of love in claret sizes included toddler child teen/adult small adult medium & adult large/xl hat & ear warmer are a crocheted simplicity original designs join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity & craftsy jennifer pionk all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2018 designed by jennifer pionk aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer pionk 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/chevron-peaks-slouch-crochet-pattern-hatnothate/
